code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import AuthService from'../../services/AuthService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Register=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[confirmPassword,setConfirmPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(password!==confirmPassword){setError("Passwords don't match");return;}try{await AuthService.register(email,password);navigate('/dashboard');}catch(err){setError('Registration failed.
